moves.1. e4: e4 is a useful openning for using bishop and quenn.
moves.1... a6: And this move does not give you any advantages. Actually it stops your upgrading.
moves.2. d4 h6: Center of the board is going to be mine... This is a big advantage.
moves.3. Nf3 b6 4. Bc4: As you see, i am moved my pieces to center. But opponent could not yet.
moves.4... Bb7: This is a small move. But after this move, you can win the game easily. Because, as i said at start: if you dont upgrade your pieces, that means, you have not pieces...
moves.6. Ne5+:
Now, if black plays 6- ... Ke8 7- Qh5+ g6 8- Qxg6#...

Than black plays 6-... Kf6 7- Qf3+ Ke6 8- Qf5+ Kd6 9- Nc4+ Kc6 10- Qd5#
But he played  Ke6... still no chance...
moves.6... Ke6 7. Qg4+ Kd6 8. Nf7+: Because he lost his queen at start of game.. Than he resigned..
